attributes.action: Give People with Mental Health the Right to live as independantly as we can
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We Want The Prime Minister to give people who have mental health problems the right to live outside of hospital with a good support around us.  We also need the Prime Minister to tell employers to not discriminate us when we try to go and find work. We also need the Prime Minister to give us money to help build our future life with our illnesses.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
